metadata.synopsis: Dialog for the circus kobold merchant, who sells weird magical items and shady stuff. He feels like the shady drug dealer on the corner who is high on his own merchandise. In this dialogue, after the dribbles fight, you can also buy dribble's hand off him (for a ridiculously high price.)
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug book, act 3, wyrm's crossing, circus of the last days. Go through the checkpoint, and popper is straight ahead and slightly to the right (he's next to stoney and boney, the married couple selling statues). To trigger the options to buy Dribbles' hand, go to the circus stage, 1,1,1, the dialogue, use killcombat, and then go back to popper. You can speak to him and notice he had dribbles hand, or you can even grab it from the chair next to him (which will automatically trigger a dialogue).

12.speaker: Popper
12.text: Your tum-tum wants a treato, don't it? Good, good! Popper's got you covered.
12.context: NodeContext: think he's being charming, but he's being a gross little perve and i love it

22.speaker: Popper
22.text: Oh, oh! Hungry little hobgoblin. Want a treato?
22.context: NodeContext: think he's being charming, but he's being a gross little perve and i love it

64.speaker: Popper
64.text: I has lots of treatos! And magics. And junks I finds. Don't worry - I only takes junks from dead people. I is nice.
64.context: NodeContext: think he's being charming, but he's being a gross little perve and i love it

44.speaker: Player
44.text: I found this severed hand among your things. Where did you get it?
44.context: NodeContext: cheerful, then realises his blunder

111.speaker: Player
111.text: How often do you loot corpses?

69.speaker: Popper
69.text: Lots of times! The beasts ate a kiddo the other day and I got some good stuffs. Uh, I mean, 'Circus is safe, do not a-worry!' Yes.

97.speaker: Player
